name: Regimancy
description:
Each night you hear the woods calling to you. They whisper the same words over and over: Inherit thine kingdom.

Regimancy is a short game about exploring a forest. It was made in the style of Adventure for the Atari 2600 and has a strong emphasis on exploration and a handful of simple puzzles.

This game has sound, but the effects are sparsely used.

Controls: Arrow keys move, Bump into items to pick them up, Space drops items, Esc key quits, and F4 toggles fullscreen.

If you accidentally drop an item in a wall, immediately press F1 to call it back to you.

For descriptions of items, please refer to "manual page 06.png" in the game folder.
